title: "The Awakening of Consciousness: A Path to Personal Power"
first_phrase: The previous text discussed the idea of personal evolution through the awakening of consciousness. The final part provides insight into specific methods and practices that can help in the elevation of one's consciousness. It mentions Jean Pontanus and his practice of refining the self through the physical and spiritual purification process. The text emphasizes that the true way to obtain this result is by awakening consciousness, and even the exercises discussed earlier can lead to this. Through this, it is possible to gain personal power and live a more conscious life.
content: Anche se nelle pagine successive saranno descritti vari metodi basati sull’energia per elevare la coscienza, l’attenzione e la vigilanza, da sole e mantenute con costanza, possono permettere di raggiungere i gradi più alti. In altre parole già gli esercizi esposti finora, condotti in maniera continuativa, possono portare al risultato finale. Come dice Jean Pontanus: “Voici quelle est cette pratique : il faut prendre la matière avec toute diligence, la broyer physiquement et la mettre dans le feu, c’est-à-dire dans le fourneau; mais il faut aussi connaître le degré et la proportion du feu. A savoir, il faut que le feu externe excite tant seulement la matière; et, en peu de temps ce feu, sans y mettre les mains en aucune manière, accomplira assurément tout l’oeuvre. Parce qu’il putréfie, corrompt, engendre et parfera tout l’ouvrage, faisant paraître les trois principales couleurs, la noire, la blanche, la rouge.
last_phrase: In conclusion, while various energy-based methods can elevate consciousness, consistency in attention and vigilance can also lead to achieving the highest levels. The exercises outlined here, when performed continuously, can bring about the desired results. By focusing on our bodies, we begin to differentiate between external realities, thoughts and emotions, and the ego dissolves, revealing the truth. As the Gospel saying goes, "Blessed are the children, for theirs is the kingdom of heaven." Stay attentive and vigilant to discover the truth within.
